data.title: Things to do in Efrat in August – Wanderlog
data.meta_description: Discover events happening in Efrat in August and activities that are perfect for a August trip to Efrat.
data.text:
Overview

August is a good time to visit Efrat. The weather is usually hot with a gentle breeze, with temperatures ranging from 71—98°F (22—36°C).

Efrat has plenty to offer for visitors of all ages and interests. In this article, we tell you the top things to see and do for your August trip to Efrat. Get inspired by the events, activities, attractions, and experiences unique to August. We’ll let you know where to explore events based on your interests, whether that’s food, culture, art, music, sport or others.

We’ll let you know everything you need to prepare for the weather in Efrat in August. Learn about what to wear and pack for your trip, the average temperatures throughout August, temperature changes from morning to evening and much more.

Visiting Efrat? See our Efrat Trip Planner.

Weather in Efrat in August

Temperatures on an average day in Efrat in August

The average temperature in Efrat in August for a typical day ranges from a high of 98°F (36°C) to a low of 71°F (22°C). Some would describe it as hot with a gentle breeze.

For comparison, the hottest month in Efrat, August, has days with highs of 98°F (36°C) and lows of 71°F (22°C). The coldest month, January has days with highs of 63°F (17°C) and lows of 44°F (7°C). This graph shows how an average day looks like in Efrat in August based on historical data.

Visiting Efrat? See our Efrat Trip Planner.

What to wear

What to wear in August

With an average high of 98°F (36°C) and a low of 71°F (22°C), it generally feels hot with a gentle breeze. With that in mind, most people would dress in something very light like a sleeveless shirt
